======Respawns dead marine/marines======
= Description =

Dead marine/marines can be respawned in game for fun.

asw_respawn_marine is exclusively used for admin, also lobby leader is allowed to use the command if [[asw_respawn_marine_enable.wiki|asw_respawn_marine_enable]] is enabled

asw_respawn_marine can run on console/developer's console and chat command '/asw_respawn_marine' as well.


== Usage ==

Console command: asw_respawn_marine < marineshortname > 

Chat command: /asw_respawn_marine < marineshortname >

for example:

'asw respawn_marine sarge'

'asw respawn_marine crash'

'asw respawn_marine ' to respawn all marines
